channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A small Chinese startup wants to jumpstart a global EV taxi revolution
item.description: U Power’s battery swap model aims to electrify Hong Kong’s taxis—and reshape commercial EV adoption worldwide

item.title: Campbell’s Soup gets a Gen X makeover — 42-year-old fashion exec joins her family at $9 billion canned-soup-and-snacks giant
item.description: A luxury shoe designer has stepped into a board role previously held by her late mother.

item.title: Crypto market soars past $4 trillion and Coinbase notches record—but traditional stocks flatline
item.description: After Congress passed landmark crypto legislation Thursday, shares of crypto-related companies skyrocketed, but the larger market dipped on Trump tari...

item.title: Opinion | It’s time to invoke the U.S. Defense Production Act to support a new battery technology revolution
item.description: "Drone dominance" for the U.S. military means relying on China’s supply chains—but there’s an alternative.

item.title: The CEO caught hugging his HR chief at a Coldplay show has been placed on leave during a formal investigation
item.description: “Our leaders are expected to set the standard in both conduct and accountability,” Astronomer announced.
